title: Immune & Respiratory Herbs and Herbal Support During the COVID-19 Outbreak - Urban Indian Health Institute
description: A Resource for Tribal Communities During the COVID-19 outbreak
cleaned_text: Mar 31, 2020 A resource for tribal communities during COVID-19 Created by Elise Krohn, Valerie Segrest, Renee Davis, Rhonda Grantham, and Sofie Geist. The information presented should in no way be construed as prevention or treatment for COVID-19. Supportive plants and foods do not provide immunity to COVID-19, and this resource is not intended to be used in diagnosis or prescription. Check with a health provider to make sure that herbs are safe to use with any medications. Funding for this document was provided by Urban Indian Health Institute and the Indian Health Service Division of Epidemiology and Disease Prevention. The contents are solely the responsibility of the authors and do not necessarily represent the official views of Urban Indian Health Institute or the Indian Health Service.
